replies.body: Yes another nerf to supports.  Why does Riot hate my lane?  At least my ranked queues are now shorter than ever.

I feel for you bro, I was trying to be a Tryndamere main. :'(

Also, your username is awesome! :P
If you like the username, type it into Google and see what comes up...
Just give Gangplank back his barrel vision and he's sweet. {{champion:41}}

Yeah, so the Crit buff is cool and all, but Tryndamere has still been nerfed into the ground by this Conqueror crap.  Any particular reason you guys had to change it?  Every streamer I watched on PBE before it was released was like "This is broken as **** on XYZ Champ, no way it'll get released".  Meanwhile at Riot HQ: "Hold my beer."

Moments later: "Conqueror is too strong, let's nerf it so much that hardly anyone (even Yi apparently) uses it and those poor bastards who still try to have next to no keystone."

Sorry for the rant, just really disappointing when things like Sylas' W which, again, virtually everyone (at least most of those I've seen and spoken to) thought was a stupid amount of early game heal (point and click, including a dash and execute btw) gets buffed but something that's strong but not really OP, get's ruined for no real reason.
When y'all gonna give Ornn another skin? Man has been sitting on base and thunderlord since release
Old Morgana skins are better. Especially the blackthorn and bewitching one. They made the dress really plain and ugly tbh. Also the animations are gone (bats under her feet).{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
I wonder how Riot catches all these bugs that are really tiny in detail when they don't fix Blackfrost Anivia's animation freeze when using /j as she's spawning.
plz fix the yasuo conq bug, where when u eq on the enemy champ with instead of giveing 2 stacks it give one
The Morg/Kayle VU are working, but the chromas and quest (sisters of justice) were there this morning but have since disappeared - or is my client bugged?
